name: BMW M4 Competition
description: The price of BMW M4 Competition, a 4 seater Coupe, starts from  of Rs. 1.53 Crore. It is available in 1 variant, with an engine of 2993 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. M4 Competition has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 6 airbags. BMW M4 Competition has a ground clearance of 120 mm  and is available in 7 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 9.7 kmpl for M4 Competition.

variants.variant_name: M4 Competition M xDrive 2993 cc, Petrol, Automatic (TC), 9.7 kmpl, 503 bhp
